Let the serene beauty of the Peaceful Ocean Live Wallpaper transform your new tab into a calming coastal escape, with gentle waves and a soothing atmosphere.

Key Features:
🌊 Relaxing Ocean Animation: Enjoy the tranquil movement of waves as they crash softly on the shore.
🖥️ Customizable Shortcuts: Easily access your favorite websites with personalized shortcuts.
🔍 Search Engine Integration: Choose your preferred search engine and surf the web with ease.
🕒 Time & Date Display: Keep track of time with a stylish clock.
🏖️ High-Quality Graphics: Crisp visuals that capture the peaceful essence of the ocean.
Relax with the Peaceful Ocean Live Wallpaper on your new tab. Dive into the calm today.
